name: Hospital Dash (brads.space)
description:
Hospital Dash

Everyone is dying and it's up to you to get them to the hospital. Collect patients and bring them in. You can collect multiple people at once for bonus score! If too many people die then its game over.

How to play
  • WASD to drive 
  • Drive into the red balls to collect Patients 
  • Drive into the green drop off zone to drop them off
